meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Caitlin Sok Isaac Loeb Rick Terpstra Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7816.

div.div: First game of Season 35. New opening graphics. Alex has a beard.

td.p: Caitlin Sok, an M.D. and Ph.D. student from Atlanta, Georgia
Isaac Loeb, a senior legislative assistant from Washington, D.C.
Rick Terpstra, an aspiring English teacher from Havertown, Pennsylvania (whose 2-day cash winnings total $39,800)

tr.td: (Alex: A tribute to 50 years of the United States Tennis Open tournament.)
EXERCISING: YOUR OPTIONS
FAMOUS THREESOMES
"IN" THE DICTIONARY
HIS WIDOW LIVED ON
OUR STATE LOOKS UP TO YOU
(Alex: You have to name the state with the longest border to the north of the state we give you.)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In 1968, the first Open men\'s singles winner was this athlete & activist, whose name is now on the Open\'s main stadium')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In 1968, the first Open men's singles winner was this athlete & activist, whose name is now on the Open's main stadium

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: Had to be a very long river, and there are only two that I can think of in the Southern Hemisphere.)
...
(Alex: [To Isaac] Down the Amazon.)
IsaacWhat is Brazil
$2,600
CaitlinWhat is Brazil?
$1,000
RickWhat is Brazil?
$0
Brazil')

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
